```{r setup}
library(funnelplot)
library(ggplot2)
data("example_data", package = "funnelplot")
head(example_data)
```

### The control argument

The control argument to `funnel` is used...

### pointTarget

```{r}
# outcome ~ covariates | cluster ID
f1 <- funnel(test ~ gender + age | hosp_id, pointTarget(limits = c(0.05,0.01),multAdj = "fdr",standardised = TRUE), data = example_data)
plot(f1)
```

### distTarget

```{r}
# outcome ~ covariates | cluster ID
f2 <- funnel(test ~ gender + age | hosp_id, distTarget(limits = c(0.05,0.01),standardised = TRUE), data = example_data)
plot(f2)
```
